author: Fred Garvin
comment: Agree with other reviewer...does everything I want it to; top, average speed, elapsed time, records tracks on map, backs up to GDrive without ads or pestering you with new friend requests or a huge t.o.s. to agree to. App takes about five seconds to get hang of and contrary to other reviews I've read, there IS a stop button. Just hit the "start" button again which pauses everything, then hit the "back" button. Voila! Great job, great app!
title: Yeah, It's Good

author: Some Body
comment: Amazing!  One of those rare gems that 1) works as advertised, 2) is simple and intuitive, and, 3) doesn't ask for unecessary and intrusive Permissions.  Instantly maps recorded rides on Google Maps and doesn't require a data connection during the ride.  Automatically pauses Moving Duration when you stop riding while Total Duration continues.  Just an intelligently designed app, well-implemented.  Great!

author: Terry Diduch
comment: I like the simplicity of this app.  I don't have a data plan on my phone and it still works great.  Then when I get to wi-fi the plot of my route shows up on the screen.  I appreciate that there is no login associated with it and that I don't have to store anything on-line.  I can only think of one more feature that might make it even better for ppl like me without data plans...  If the app could take advantage of the downloaded Google Map data that I already have in my phone, it would allow me to see where I am and have been in real time without having to switch to Google Maps.  I know that that isn't simple, but then it would be essentially equivalent to the bike specific GPS units.  Great app.  Took me a while to find it, but very pleased with it.  Thanks!

author: Darin Prickett
comment: Works great and has become my favorite bike app. Love the large contrasting display and it doesn't rapidly drain my battery. Would be nice though if Bikey also tracked the current weather conditions when logging a ride.

author: Paul McMahon
comment: Positives: * Simple, intuitive and easy to use * Interface is functional and uncluttered * Synced easily to HR monitor.   Negatives: * Understated speed, distance and HR compared to other apps - at least for off-road * Export files don't preserve HR data.   Overall for me it is an uninstall, I wanted to like it but couldn't live with it as my primary cycling app.
Great app  . I like to give 5 stars but lack of stop and save buttons took one star out. I can start quick I can pause but no stop . It has auto save but likes a saving option.
title: App with no brakes

author: gee cee
comment: Great except... The finish time was off by almost 30 minutes (showed 5:07pm when it was really 5:33pm), but it calculates the actual cycling time correctly. The altitude from my start and finish point was very different even though it was the same place.

Love it and would give a 5 Star but Max Speed was off by 20 mph (19 instead of 39 mph which was sustained and reading out on the app so it should have recorded it) Since this was off can I trust any of the figures?

author: Richard Brown
comment: Good app but would like to see more than one setting at a time.Its seems ok

author: Joe Tilman
comment: Everything I need: GPS tracker and speedo, no adverts. Love it!
title: Best cyclometer, no social BS

author: Ip Har
comment: Works so well, it's an incredible substitute for a Cateye cyclocomputer.
title: There is no other like it!

author: Loreto Tan
comment: Very good app, easy to use and helpful to bikers monitoring distance, time, etc...Thanks to the app makers...

author: Rob Mayhue
comment: I've been using Bikey for a few months now and it works great. Simple to use and lightweight. Good job!

author: Soe Thura
comment: This is best app for cycling. But I cant connect with MI band 2 in current version(v2.2.0).
Excellent. No login, no ads, easy to use. Thumbs up.

author: Mister Me
comment: Does what it promises and does it well.

author: Julian Fowler
comment: Does everything I need; especially like the cadence counter.

author: joe holland
comment: Just what I was looking for
title: Simple with no hassle

author: leon bouter
comment: To find finally this simple perfect working app after tried many others who all gave me problems used with Elephone P8000
title: Very happy

author: John Sholes
comment: Just what you need & work perfect
title: Perfect!

author: Antique Lad
comment: Minimalism is good!
title: Allez biquette!

author: Cory Roberts
comment: Just when I was ready to give up my search for a simple bike computer app.
title: Fantastic!

author: Carmen Alvarez
comment: Best app for recording a track and sharing it. I then upload the tracks into Garmin or view them in Google Earth on my pc.
title: Great

author: Jerome Bonnet
comment: This app is sooo wonderful I even use it to record my tracks in the metro! Awesome !
title: Awesome

author: Marcelo Günther
comment: Isn't  way to  close
title: Don't  have stopped boton
